emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Software Development Ecosystems
emerging_technologies.description: Systems where AI not only assists in coding but also manages project timelines, bug fixes, and continuous integration/deployment.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces human error in software development, increases productivity, but raises concerns over job displacement.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires significant investment in AI training, ethical considerations, and workforce reskilling.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace Interface
emerging_technologies.description: A biocompatible mesh that interfaces directly with the brain to enhance cognitive functions or control digital devices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize education, entertainment, and medical treatment but brings up privacy and ethical issues.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High cost, regulatory hurdles, and societal acceptance of invasive technology.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Transport Systems
emerging_technologies.description: Fully integrated autonomous public transport systems, including buses, trams, and micro-transit options.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces traffic congestion, pollution, and accidents but requires infrastructure changes and public trust.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: City planning, regulatory approval, and public acceptance of autonomous vehicles.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Encryption Networks
emerging_technologies.description: Networks utilizing quantum key distribution for unbreakable encryption, enhancing data security.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Provides unprecedented security for digital communications, affecting both privacy and national security.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires significant advances in quantum technology, high cost, and international cooperation.

emerging_technologies.name: Eco-Symbiotic Building Materials
emerging_technologies.description: Materials that actively contribute to environmental sustainability by purifying air, managing water, or producing energy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes a healthier living environment and reduces urban heat islands but requires new construction standards.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Initial cost, availability of materials, and integration with existing infrastructure.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Coding Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools that now provide full-cycle support from coding to deployment, significantly reducing human involvement.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech industries, reshaping software development practices.

mainstream_technologies.name: Blockchain-based Digital Identity
mainstream_technologies.description: A secure, decentralized identity system used for online verification and privacy protection.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Governmental and private sectors adopt for secure transactions and identity management.

epoch_themes.description: The widespread integration of AI into all sectors to enhance productivity and efficiency.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhances productivity but necessitates workforce adaptation and new job creation.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased demand for AI ethics, regulation, and education in AI technologies.

epoch_themes.description: Technological enhancements to human capabilities, focusing on cognitive and sensory augmentation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potentially increases human capabilities but raises ethical and privacy issues.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing interest in bioethics, human rights in technology, and neurotechnology laws.

epoch_themes.description: Creating cities that are self-sustaining, eco-friendly, and resilient to environmental changes.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life, reduces environmental footprint, but requires significant urban redesign.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Focus on green technology, urban planning for sustainability, and climate change adaptation.
